author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: آياتُ حُكُومَتِكَ فِي مَمْلَكَتِكَ، فَيا إِلهِي قَدْ ضَاقَ صَدْرِيْ وَأَخَذَنِيَ الهَمُّ وَالغَمُّ عَنْ كُلِّ الجِهاتِ بِما أَسْمَعُ كُلَّ ذِكْرٍ بَيْنَ عِبادِكَ دُوْنَ بَدائِعِ ذِكْرِكَ، وَأَرى كُلَّ شَيْءٍ بَيْنَ بَرِيَّتِكَ إِلاَّ ما أَمَرْتَهُمْ بِهِ
translation: I swear by Thy glory! My sole purpose in showing forth Thine ascendancy hath been to glorify Thy Cause, and to magnify Thy word. I am persuaded that if Thou wert to delay to send down Thy victory and to demonstrate Thy power, the signs of Thy sovereignty would assuredly perish in Thy land, and the tokens of Thy rule would be blotted out throughout Thy dominion.
